00027         typedef enum
00028         {
00029             STATUS_OK,                  
00030             STATUS_NOT_FOUND,           
00031             STATUS_NULL_POINTER,        
00032             STATUS_MEM_EXHAUSTED

00036 
00037         // These functions are designed for RedBlackTree internal use.
00038         // You generally shouldn't use them unless you know what you're doing.
00039 
00040         template < class T >
00041         __inline T Duplicate ( T const &_data )
00042         {
00043             return _data;
00044         }
00045         
00046         template <>
00047         __inline char *Duplicate ( char * const &_data )
00048         {
00049             return strdup ( _data );
00050         }
00051 
00052         template <>
00053         __inline const char *Duplicate ( const char * const &_data )
00054         {
00055             return strdup ( _data );
00056         }
00057 
00058         template < class T >
00059         __inline void Dealloc ( T const &_data )
00060         {
00061         }
00062         
00063         template <>
00064         __inline void Dealloc ( char * const &_data )
00065         {
00066             if ( _data ) free ( _data );
00067         }
00068         
00069         template <>
00070         __inline void Dealloc ( const char * const &_data )
00071         {
00072             if ( _data ) free ( (char *)_data );
00073         }
00074

00078         template < class Key, class Data >
00079         class RedBlackTree
00080         {
00081 
00082         public:
00084             typedef enum { BLACK, RED } nodeColor;
00085             typedef enum
00086             {
00087                 NODE_ITSELF_VISITED = 0,
00088                 LEFT_CHILD_VISITED,
00089                 ALL_CHILDS_VISITED
00090             } beenThereEnum;
00092 
00094             RedBlackNode<Key,Data> *rootNode;
00095             
00097             RedBlackNode<Key,Data> *NULL_NODE;
00098 
00100             RedBlackTree ();
00101             
00103             ~RedBlackTree ();
00104 
00106 
00112             statusEnum insert ( Key const &_key, Data const & _rec );
00113

00122             statusEnum erase ( Key const &_key );
00123 
00125 
00133             statusEnum erase ( Key const &_key, Data const & _rec );
00134 
00136 
00143             statusEnum killNode ( RedBlackNode<Key,Data> * _z );
00144 
00146 
00150             Data find ( Key const &_key ) const;
00151 
00153 
00158             RedBlackNode<Key,Data> *findNode ( Key const &_key ) const;
00159 
00161 
00165             inline bool valid ( const RedBlackNode<Key,Data> *_node ) const
00166             { return ( _node != NULL && _node != NULL_NODE ); };
00167 
00169             inline void empty () { killAll(); rootNode = NULL_NODE; };
00170 
00171         protected:
00172 
00173             /*
00174             these are automatically called. no need to use them externally at all.
00175             */
00176             void killAll ( RedBlackNode<Key,Data> *_rec );
00177             void killAll ();
00178 
00179         public:
00181 
00184 #ifndef _DEBUG
00185             inline size_t size () const { return m_cachedSize; };
00186 #else
00187             size_t size () const;
00188 #endif

00203             DArray <Key>  *ConvertIndexToDArray () const;
00204 
00205             /*
00206                 Deprecated Compatibility Functions
00207                 Provided for compatibility with Tosser I
00208             */
00210             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(insert) inline statusEnum PutData ( Key const &_key, Data const & _rec ) { return insert ( _key, _rec ); };
00211             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(erase) inline statusEnum RemoveData ( Key const &_key ) { return erase ( _key ); };
00212             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(erase) inline statusEnum remove ( Key const &_key ) { return erase ( _key ); };
00213             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(erase) inline statusEnum remove ( Key const &_key, Data const & _rec  ) { return erase ( _key, _rec ); };
00214             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(size) inline size_t Size () const { return size(); };
00215             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION_N inline void Empty () { killAll(); };
00217 
00218         protected:
00220             size_t m_cachedSize;

00222             void RecursiveConvertIndexToDArray ( DArray <Key> *_darray, RedBlackNode<Key,Data> *_btree ) const;
00223             void RecursiveConvertToDArray ( DArray <Data> *_darray, RedBlackNode<Key,Data> *_btree ) const;
00224 
00225             void rotateLeft ( RedBlackNode<Key,Data> * _x );
00226             void rotateRight ( RedBlackNode<Key,Data> * _x );
00227             void insertFixup ( RedBlackNode<Key,Data> * _x );
00228             void deleteFixup ( RedBlackNode<Key,Data> * _x );
